short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension removes Geeks for Geeks sign-in popup, enabling unrestricted access to site's content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension offers a convenient solution for users who are tired of being prompted to log in every time they visit Geeks for Geeks. By removing the sign-in popup, it allows users to access the site's content without any interruption or inconvenience. With this extension, users can browse Geeks for Geeks freely and efficiently, without having to enter their login credentials every time. Whether you are a frequent visitor or just a casual reader, this extension will make your experience on Geeks for Geeks smoother and more enjoyable. So if you want to access the site's content without any hassle, give this extension a try!
